alert.note: Alert for Coconino (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 31 at 3:55PM MST until July 31 at 9:30PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of north central Arizona, including the following county, Coconino. * WHEN...Until 800 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of creeks and normally dry washes is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 355 PM MST, Flooding is ongoing near Tuba City on the Moenkopi Wash resulting from to heavy rainfall on Saturday south of Shonto. Flooding of farm fields is the area has been reported. - This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Moenkopi Wash, Hamblin Wash and Fivemile Wash. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Tuba City, Moenkopi and Navajo Reservation. - This includes the following highways... Highway 160 between mile markers 315 and 326. State Route 264 between mile markers 322 and 325. - Visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for more information on flood safety.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
